description.narrative:
Objective
The main aims are:
To become a sustainable social enterprise providing employment opportunities to people from marginalized groups;
Completion and automation of the printing process by introduction of the new machinery; Identification of new potential clients and cooperation's with new clients Promotion of social entrepreneurship In local community Expected results
Raising the quality of printing services and creating a sustainable concept of social entrepreneurship at the level of Republic of Serbia
2. To use example of Caritas Valjevo printing office as an example of good practice in the
development of social entrepreneurship
Main activities
Preparation of space for new machines Procurement of machines Installation and putting machines in function Hiring new worker Training of employees Promotion through media
Results achieved
In the guide "Socially, useful, sustainable: How to establish a social enterprise in Serbia", which was published by the European Movement in Serbia, Caritas Valjevo printing office was presented as an example of good practice.
if relevant:

If this is a financially and economically sustainable social economy initiative please describe below what makes it sustainable:
No need for additional external financial support.
